Connecting Users Through Design

Me

Josh Kissel

Planning to graduate in May 2016 with focus in Visual Design and UX/ UI development.

A fourth year Graphic Design student at Montana State University with an interest in visual design, user experience, front-end web design/development, branding, and letterpress. He has gained valuable real world experience and held jobs in the Graphic Design field specifically: web design, UI/UX design, web development, t-shirt design and printing, social media management, and freelance design.
